overview: Life is not easy for anyone and the money is getting shorter for Antonia, who is unemployed.  But she doesn't lose her sense of humor even when she gets into a huge mess.  Outraged by the increase in prices in the only market in the neighborhood, which on top of that no longer accepts credit, the housewife sets up a scandal and ends up infecting other customers who, like her, have no money to pay the bill.
title: Não Vamos Pagar Nada
